title: Pfaffhausen
text:
Pfaffhausen (also known as Pffaffhausen) is a settlement in the municipality of <a href="F%C3%A4llanden">Fällanden</a> in the <a href="canton%20of%20Z%C3%BCrich">canton of Zürich</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It has an elevation of 597 m, and lies in the valley between the northern flank of the <a href="%C3%96schbrig">Öschbrig</a> and the southeastern slope of the <a href="Adlisberg">Adlisberg</a>. Pfaffhausen borders the Zürich quarter of <a href="Witikon">Witikon</a> to the west, the settlement of Binz (belonging to <a href="Maur%2C%20Switzerland">Maur</a>) to the south, and the settlement of Benglen, also part of Fällanden, to the east.
It is very easily accessible by public transportation from Zurich and <a href="Volketswil">Volketswil</a>.
